document.full_text: paid subscriptions to read news corp's wall street journal on tablet devices such as apple inc's ipad and electronic readers have quadrupled to 200,000 in the past year, a top executive said.
document.title: news corp's hinton says tablet subscriptions soar
lines_and_colors: paid subscriptions to read news corp's wall street journal on tablet devices such as apple inc's ipad and electronic readers have quadrupled to 200,000 in the past year, a top executive said.
